in_scope: Create AatGateReceipt Rust type with 22 fields

steps: Include all 22 required fields in proto
Define AatGateReceipt struct with all fields
Define DeterminismStatus, FlakeClass, AatVerdict, RiskTier enums
Write unit tests for required field validation
Write unit tests for run count matching

notes.security:
AatGateReceipt is the typed payload for AAT gate results.
All 22 fields are required to ensure complete evidence binding.
notes.implementation_details:
AatGateReceipt fields (22):
1. view_commitment_hash, 2. rcp_manifest_hash, 3. rcp_profile_id
4. policy_hash, 5. determinism_class, 6. determinism_status
7. flake_class, 8. run_count, 9. run_receipt_hashes
10. terminal_evidence_digest, 11. observational_evidence_digest
12. terminal_verifier_outputs_digest, 13. stability_digest
14. verdict, 15. transcript_chain_root_hash, 16. transcript_bundle_hash
17. artifact_manifest_hash, 18. terminal_verifier_outputs
19. verifier_policy_hash, 20. selection_policy_id, 21. risk_tier
22. attestation
